name: Go Find Carl
description:
Go Find Carl is a spoopy game about trying to find your friend Carl who asked for your help.

GAMEPLAY:

  • Avoid the dangerous Zombunnies that roam the city
  • Solve a few (easy) puzzles
  • Use different items to advance

PLAYTIME:

  • 5-20 min

Created for the No Travel game jam on RMWeb.
Feedback is highly appreciated!
